verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
While I live <S%H2416><s%> will I praise <S%H1984><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: I will sing praises <S%H2167><s%> unto my God while I have any being <S%H430><s%>.
Put not your trust <S%H982><s%> in princes <S%H5081><s%>, Nor in the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, in whom there is no help <S%H8668><s%>.
His breath <S%H7307><s%> goeth forth <S%H3318><s%>, he returneth <S%H7725><s%> to his earth <S%H127><s%>; In that very day <S%H3117><s%> his thoughts <S%H6250><s%> perish <S%H6><s%>.
Happy <S%H835><s%> is he that hath the God <S%H410><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for his help <S%H5828><s%>, Whose hope <S%H7664><s%> is in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%>:
Who made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>, The sea <S%H3220><s%>, and all that in them is <S%H8104><s%>; Who keepeth truth <S%H571><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>;

Who executeth <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> for the oppressed <S%H6231><s%>; Who giveth <S%H5414><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> to the hungry <S%H7457><s%>. Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> looseth <S%H5425><s%> the prisoners <S%H631><s%>;

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> openeth <S%H6491><s%> the eyes of the blind <S%H5787><s%>; Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> raiseth <S%H2210><s%> up them that are bowed down <S%H3721><s%>; Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> loveth <S%H157><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>;

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> preserveth <S%H8104><s%> the sojourners <S%H1616><s%>; He upholdeth <S%H5749><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and widow <S%H490><s%>; But the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> he turneth upside down <S%H5791><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will reign <S%H4427><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, Thy God <S%H430><s%>, O Zion <S%H6726><s%>, unto all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>.
